member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDomainDataSource
member.summary: Provides an object for loading, filtering, grouping, and sorting data collections.
member.remarks: Use this component to simplify the interaction between the user interface and data from a DomainContext. After specifying a DomainContext and QueryName, the RadDomainDataSource can load data and expose it through the Data and DataView properties. This component also provides codeless integration between other Telerik data controls like RadGridView, RadDataPager and RadDataFilter.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Load is automatically invoked when a change occurs that impacts the query composed by the domain data source.
member.value: true if the domain data source is will automatically invoke Load when a change occurs that impacts the query composed by the domain data source; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the delay before an automatic data loading operation is started.
member.value: The delay before an automatic data loading operation is started.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control can perform a load operation based on the present state.
member.value: true if this instance can load data; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDomainDataSource.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items displayed on each page of the view returned from Data, or 0 to disable paging. A non-zero page size will cause the number of entities loaded with each Load operation to be limited as well, using server-side paging.
member.value: The size of the page.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the currently has any entities with pending changes.
member.value: true if has changes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDomainDataSource.DomainContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the DomainContext instance used for executing the load and submit operations.
member.value: The domain context.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDomainDataSource.QueryName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the query to use for loading.
member.value: The name of the query to use for loading data.
member.remarks: The DomainContext will be searched for a method that returns an EntityQuery, with a name that matches the name provided to QueryName. The matched name can be with or without a "Query" suffix.
